2.description: This review is based solely on my experience the other afternoon, dining in during hours of their lunch special.  I should add that if I started my meal eating their egg roll I would have hated the experience and the rest of my meal.  It tasted "mechanical," I wondered whether it could have been store bought or they purchase their egg rolls in bulk from a food service.Food is of, that, fresh and made to order quality.  Or so, that's what's said and shared by their fans that may-be-dining in if you plan to stop by.  That's what was told to me by a frequent diner that opted to share far more information about his visits than I was willing to hear about.  He got an order of fried chicken wings and rice.  He kept eyeing my food, I guess hoping I would share some.  It was odd in there.  Despite that, the customer service was great.  The folks that work here are welcoming and thankful for the business they get daily.  During my time in there, the hostess welcomed a number of repeat customers with a warm smile and greeting.  There is quite an amount of traffic that comes through here.Although the food looked good, it didn't taste as good.  Not to me anyway.  I've already uploaded a few photos of foodporn, so enjoy.  I came to check out their General Tso's since I'd heard praise for it and read about it on Yelp.  Unfortunately, it's taste didn't live up to my standards.One and done.

34.description: Not at all impressed with this place. The sesame chicken was dry inside and almost as dry on the outside, it's like the cook used less than half of the sauce most places would. Honestly, it was disgusting. The chicken fried rice was decent, but overall I think I will look for other places around here to feed my Chinese fix.

32.description: Never writen a review online, but I need others to know... I used to like this place, started telling everyone about this cheap local place, with fast Delivery. But, over the years it has not been the same. We have been ordering from here of about 7 years. So when the order is wrong, chicken is dry...You say that they are having a bad day. I can no longer over look the down hill food & service. I went to pick up food & the place was dirty, chairs ripped and duck taped over. You leave grateful that they deliver so that you do not see that every time. Then, last week we ordered food to be delivered, knew that they were busy. After an hour, called to make sure they had the correct address, was told ten minutes he was on his way. Half hour later the deliver called, said he was at Addison which is FIVE blockes aways was told it would be ten more minutes. After waiting that long what do you say but OK.  Twenty minutes later we called for an update, was told the driver went back, said we did not want it.... REALLY!!! You wait TWO HOURS, to find out that they are not going to deliver your food. NEVER even apologized... So if you want to take a chance that they are havin a "good" day, go ahead and doll the dice. I will be eating around the corner at a more consistent Chinese place.

18.description: I'm updating the review for this place. The orange chicken is awesome, but the rice tasted a lot better the last time I ordered from here then the first. Egg rolls and the pineapple smoothie is delicious.Orange chicken lunch special+3 vegetable egg rolls+pineapple smoothie= about 12.50 (I forgot the exact amount) lol

41.description: I also live in Jeff Park and this is the best delivery Chinese we've tried around here. The food is always really good and very consistent -- and the chicken looks and tastes like chicken (not pieces and parts - yuck)! One of the best things is the very fast delivery service. A couple of times we've ordered our food only to have it delivered within 15 minutes! Crazy fast! If you live in the neighborhood it is definitely worth a try....

13.description: This is the best Chinese food in the Jeff Park area.  My favorites are the chicken wings, chicken with string beans, beef chow fun, and crab Rangoon.  We have ordered here many times and the food has consistently been fantastic.  The prices are pretty cheap, and the food is ready quickly.  So happy we found this place!

4.description: The crab rangoon was hollow, no cream cheese or crab inside.  The chicken fried rice was alright. The pepper steak had little steak, and I'm not entirely sure it was really steak. All in all, it wasn't bad but it wasn't good either.

24.description: They have the best chicken with vegetable. I get it all the time for lunch since I work next door. Great people who run the place too. Never had a problem with them

6.description: The orange chicken has some residue taste of something else that I can't describe, maybe a little too orangey. It was drenched in sauce and made the chicken a bit soggy. Please think about serving customers healthier food.

22.description: This was my first time ordering from  this place. I don't live too far from there and placed my order for a delivery. I ordered Orange Chicken and extra spicy beef friend rice. They delivered food in less than 20  minutes. And the food was delish!! I highly recommend to anyone to try it! This is their online menu. Check it out! allmenus.com/il/chicago/…

15.description: Love this place - food is good, fresh, they are efficient and fast.

40.description: Its funny, i can no longer eat orange chicken anywhere else but here!  The chicken is WHITE meat chunks.  The breading thin and the sauce is good!  Their mongolian beef is good too.  Eggrolls are standard and i like that.  The only complaint is that they cannot seem to do spicy as hot as I would like it.  But I can live.  Also, you can see them cook the food so you know whats going on in the kitchen.  Their delivery is fast.  Eating there is not my idea of a good time cause there are only like 4 tables but its great to go!

7.description: I ordered about 30 minutes from closing which I hate doing but they were so nice and quick. Really close to my house they said 10 min I made it there before 10 minutes and they had my food ready. They were closing up and the kitchen and everything looked spot clean which I love to see when trying a new place. I got the orange chicken dinner special which comes with chicken fried rice and an egg roll, and also an order of crab Rangoon. My total was $12.02 which is amazingly cheap and they gave me I think 8-10 crab rangoons. The food was so good! I don't have one complaint it was fresh is was hot and huge portions. The rice didn't taste dirty or dry and same with the Orange chicken. The Orange chicken did taste/smell more orangy than other places but the chicken was so good. Definitely going to go back to try more!

36.description: This is my FAVORITE take out Chinese place in all of Chicago! They have the best pan fried noodles......just enough crunch and not too greasy. This is also the only Chinese place that will let me order chicken and broccoli with mushrooms & water chesnuts and just a little szechuan sauce. I'm picky and don't want all those other mixed veggies in my dish. They have fast delivery and the food is fresh and delicious!

30.description: Staff friendly food is great. One time I needed help translating something into Chinese to a third party over the phone. They were kind enough to help me do that even though their restraunt was busy. The prices are great here too. Its just a little space they have to sit but I still give them five stars for the excellent customer service and end product / pricing! If they keep up the good work they will be in a larger place soon!

3.description: When a snow storm hits, order Chinese take out! My friends and I ordered from here a couple of nights ago when the snow piled up and we were too lazy to make food. Between the 5 of us we ordered, Beef and broccoli, sesame chicken, sweet and sour chicken, Kung Pao beef and a chicken fried rice. To be honest, we were very surprised they we're even willing to deliver given the weather conditions. We were told it would be there in 30-45 minutes. The food came very quickly and the lady who delivered seemed to be very nice. It looked like we ordered a lot of food haha. Beef and broccoli - tasty and typical. Sesame chicken and Sweet and sour chicken - good crunch batter but was overly drenched in sauces. Both of the sauces were tangy and sweet.  The sesame chicken sauce was darker and more soy based.  Kung Pao beef - tasted very good. Nicely seasoned and not too greasy. Chicken fried rice- man I don't know how much MSG and stuff they put in his but the fried rice was amazing. Got a free egg roll which was nice. Overall very grateful they delivered on such a miserable day and did enjoy the food. Will be ordering from them again.

14.description: Great place for some Real good combination chicken fried rice and orange chicken the service is always great and the main lady who takes my orders is super sweet and very kind no matter how busy she always smiles. I love the orange chicken here and it's lighting fast. It's my favorite spot in Jefferson park.

0.description: While I personally do not frequent this particular establishment, my mother does. By her standards they do excellent work & cater to her every need. On a personal note they do go above and beyond. Picking her up & dropping her off at home when my sister or myself are unable to take her. Now that's service!

My friend and I came here on the "little bars we've never been to in our neighborhood pubcrawl."  This is a nice mix of Irish immigrants and established locals.  The bar is clean, has $2 beers everyday and scotch is $4 a glass.  It looks like a shady biker bar from the front, but it's pleasantly nice inside.This little tavern has bags in the backyard, a nice table for chilling, and they provide free food once in a while grilled up by one of the patrons.  Mrs. Murray is an older woman that lives upstairs, I have to still meet her.  It's like being at a house party with the big backyard, barbecue grill and bag pit.  I'd recommend this place if you are looking for a new watering hole with great people that are very welcoming.  The bartender has been the same woman each time and she is on top of her game.

1.description: Dr. Crompton and Dr. Holicka are excellent. Everybody in the office is very helpful and extremely experienced. I have been going here all my life and have never had a single bad experience. I recently inquired about LASIK and they recommended an amazing surgeon and did all my follow up as well. I definitely recommend them for all your vision needs. They are on the first floor of the medical building on the corner of Central and Higgins. If you park in the lot, walk in the doors and follow the hall to the left. It should lead you to their door. Call ahead to make sure you can get an appointment that day. You won't be disappointed!

0.description: Note: this review is for staff only. I have not had an appointment to see the doc yet (I was in town for a visit only), but my interaction with the staff was awesome. The staff is really friendly and responsive. Based on this alone, I would give these folks a shot for my optometry needs, and hopefully you will too!

58.description: Although I was not present when Crystal worked on our door,  my parents said it took less than a half hour to replace the door springs. They were on time and reasonable. I would recommend Crystal to anyone needing garage door repairs.

56.description: Very pleased with the entire team at Crystal Overhead Door.  They go above and beyond.  My first experience with them was a few years ago when I had a garage emergency at a duplex I own.  They came by within 15 minutes, repaired the issue, strengthened the door system.  Ever since then, I have been a repeat customer. When my wife and I bought a new home, first step to make sure the garage was good and service it was Crystal Overhead Door.  They go above and beyond in their work as well as do what they can to save the customer money.  I plan on being a repeat customer and I've noticed loyalty pays off both ways with them.  Very grateful they are around.

29.description: Tom was terrific!  On time. Sussed out the problem which Was an old garage door pad.  Replaced. Forgot to give yelp coupon. Called and they fixed right away.  These are my go to garage folks!!!!

42.description: Eric, the owner, was a huge help today.  Remote door openers weren't working right.  He solved problem over the phone and all it took was new batteries.  The next time I have any problem with the garage,  I will call Crystal.

23.description: called them up as their sticker was on the garage door in my house (it was there when i bought the house). I was having an issue with the door and wanted to get someone out to look at it. The guy on the phone (didn't get his name) told me what it likely was over the phone after hearing my description and said to call back if that didn't work. Lo and behold it did. He could have easily sent someone out for a service call (and fee) for the easy fix. Great service and upstanding company. I'll us them again in the future.

47.description: My garage door broke in the am and wouldn't open trapping my car in.  I had a full day of appointments that went down the drain.  Anyhow, I called a few places to come by and they were able to get here first.  Tom the technician was very knowledgeable, he was doing the work on auto pilot, I even jokingly said he could do it in his sleep.  Overall I'm happy I called them.  I don't imagine they were the most expensive but I don't believe they were cheap either, but I had no problem paying a premium when I know I have a real pro doing the work (which was the case here) versus a weekend warrior.  I'm a fan and I'll call them again should I need the service

8.description: Great local business! Garage door stopped closing and despite of our unprofessional attempts, we could fix the problem ourselves. Called Crystal Overhead Door. The gentleman who answered the phone gave me some tips to try (just in case they worked which would save me money!) but also made an appointment. Technician arrived on time, replaced the sensors and was done in 20 minutes. I highly recommend Crystal Overhead Door.

31.description: Needed same day service for a broken door (lock was inadvertently engaged on the door, then opened, which snapped a cable, etc.).  After searching online for Garage Door Repair, I called Sears Repair at 7am.  They said they would call by 8am.  I'm still waiting for that call...  instead, I went to the next search result, which was Yelp.  Saw Crystal's ratings, and gave them a call.  First off, they answered the phone!  A real, live person!  They took my info, and said they could have somebody out that day, by 2pm.  Sure enough at 1:55pm, Tom arrived (after a call five minutes out letting me know they were on their way).  He was very knowledgeable, courteous, thorough and fast.  He had my door fixed, lubricated and tightened in 45 minutes, while taking the time to explain to me what had happened, and what to look out for.Would totally recommend this company.  And ask for Tom!  A+ job.

34.description: After getting an estimate for the replacing of our gate motor from another company totaling about $800, including safety sensors, I called Crystal and was immediately told the issue could lie elsewhere, that the sensors were really overkill and that it should cost us much less to fix our problem. They sent someone else out a couple days later and sure enough the original estimate was incorrect and Crystal's was spot on. They replaced the capacitor of our gate motor, instead of the whole motor, and didn't push the safety sensors on us and we saved $660 over the original estimate. Thank you Crystal!

16.description: My garage door would not go down without me holding down the button until the door closed. I called the wonderful people at Crystal Overhead door and they told me to check the sensors. I did, I had blocked them. So, quick fix, over the phone, no charge. What great service.

13.description: Called yesterday afternoon and Joel and Tom were out this morning.  Professional and knowledgeable.  The overhead door had a broken trolly, cables, torsion springs and a bracket.  Less than 90 minutes later and in the freezing cold the door system was good as new.  I highly recommend Crystal Overhead Door.

11.description: I had a problem with closing and opening my door and I had no idea what was wrong. I had to get this fixed as soon as possible because of the snow getting inside my garage. I hired this company and they took care of everything I was very impressed with how quick the issue was solved and how professional the service was.

39.description: I chose this place based on the great reviews, but these guys are a scam.  I'll save you the details, but it has been one thing after the other. Each time they come out, there's another $200 bill to keep my garage door working. Yesterday was the fourth time in two years; the guy tried to sell me a  whole new system for $380 (my system is only two years old), and when I declined, he essentially threatened me and told me that something would go wrong where I would need his help. Then he wouldn't give my remote back and told me I needed to give him $40 for a new one. I had to pretend to buy the new system to get my remote; as soon as he left I called to cancel. Scary. So, beware. They are very nice on the phone, but they are a money pit. I'd take all of those reviews with a big grain of salt.

37.description: I called Crystal Overhead Door this morning (around 8:00AM) and spoke with a very friendly gentleman who told me he'd put me on the list and see if he could get someone out to me today.  He didn't make any promises, but said technicians are often in my area and they'd do their best to get out to me.  I received a call around 12:00PM that someone was on their way and they'd be there by 12:15PM.  By 12:45PM the problem was fixed.  The technician was very friendly, professional, and fixed what turned out to be multiple issues.  The service call was $80.00.  When I booked the appointment, I wasn't aware of the Yelp deal and really could've used that $25.00 savings, but I didn't see it until I just jumped on here to write my review.  Oh well.  Now I know.  If you can manage the problem on your own and book an appointment 24 hours in advance, take advantage of the Yelp deal and save $25.00!  Thanks Crystal Overhead Door!  Now I can leave my house and not worry if my garage door is popping back open and leaving all my stuff vulnerable to the neighborhood bandits!

0.description: We submitted a service request to Crystal Overhead Door after having a really bad experience with a big box company and the manufacturer's installer they work with. Within 12 hours we had a response from Crystal and was able to set up an appointment date and time that worked for us. (during our first attempt at getting a new garage door opener, it took 1 month to schedule a date). We bought our own garage door opener and had Mike from Crystal Overhead Door install it on September 23, a week after first contacting them. Mike was very professional and got the job completed in an hour. We are very happy with our new garage door opener and very happy to have called Crystal Overhead Door. We live in a townhouse complex and will definitely recommend Crystal Overhead Door to our neighbors and friends as well. Thank you!

38.description: Had an issue with our garage door where our spring snapped due to the cold and had our cars stuck in the garage during the recent cold wave.  Called, left a message and they responded promptly as well as fit us into their schedule that day even though they were obviously slammed with others like us having issues with their garage doors due to the cold.They came out when they said they would and we're very good about calling ahead and providing an ETA, fixed the door quickly - apparently an easy fix since we already had another working spring that they could connect to and for the garage door opened in minutes. Didn't even charge us.Seriously a great company that offers top notch customer service and support along with excellent communication,  I'd recommend them to anyone looking for a assistance with their garage doors.Thanks again, guys -

51.description: Very pleased with Crystal Overhead.  Eric returned my call right away and scheduled an appointment, with a 4 hour window.  Tom called about 3 hours into the window, apologizing that he was running late but should arrive at X:XX, which was ~20 minutes after the window...which is not bad at all given how far we are from their typical locations.  Tom was professional, friendly, fixed our problem quickly, explained the pricing prior to fixing it, checked our other doors for issues, suggested preventative maintenance and the fee was very reasonable based on other repairs we've had. I will use them again if we need garage door repair.

27.description: I called Crystal Overhead Door last week and immediately had somoene (Tom) come out the next day. Tom clearly knew his trade and recommended replacement of the cables, & pulleys as they were in really bad shape. I appreciate the maintenance recommendations from Tom and he also changed the burnt out bulb. My only "gripe" is that I thought the $90 service fee was on the high side, but maybe that's an industry standard? At any rate, I do appreciate the prompt response and quality of the service.

32.description: Crystal Overhead Door has serviced my garage door for several years and they have always been responsive, fast and thorough with reasonable rates. Two nights ago, Tom, their technician who has done repair work for me before, performed service on my garage door under terrible weather conditions. He had a positive attitude and performed a great job doing repair work required to keep the door working in my older frame garage. Thank you and kudos to Tom and Crystal.

54.description: Lightning struck our transformer in the alley frying my and our neighbor's garage door openers. Called Crystal Overhead and they sent over Tom who was very thorough in assessing the problem. Not only did he replace the logic board but also applied some wd40 and made the door opening and closing much quieter. Highly recommend. Whole process was about 45 minutes. Used them twice already after a recommendation from my local hardware store, and highly recommend to all.

48.description: So this past Saturday, after just 3 days of home-ownership, my new garage stopped working.  Panicked, and pissed off, I call Crystal Overhead (suggested by my Home Warranty company who told me a broken spring wasn't covered).  Eric, the owner, called me back within 10 minutes of leaving the emergency page.  Eric  came right over, leaving a family function to fix my garage door.He quickly diagnosed it wasn't a broken spring, as I had feared,, and instead that it was a drum that got out of whack.  Not content with merely fixing the problem, he wanted to diagnose what caused it.  He quickly figured out that what had happened was that the door which is entrance to the garage from the backyard had probably swung to far open, thus blocking the garage doors descent.  That combined with the fact that the setting for the motor was set such that the door was banging down to hard, caused the problem.After that he talked me through preventative maintenance, explained why I might be having some leakage issues at the base of the garage walls, and was basically full of VERY useful information  He seemed like a great guy, who really cares about his customers and wants to do the job right the first time!  If you live in the north/northwest side or the northwest/northern collar communities, if you have ANY garage door needs--repair, installation, you name it--Crystal Overhead Door should be your first and only call!!

44.description: So pleased with my experience from Crystal Overhead Door.  Very professional through the whole process.  Found them through a recommendation from a friend (who also told me that they called to thank he for the recommendation) and was pleased to see the other positive reviews on Yelp.  One of the track wheels on my garage door was twisted and I could not open it.  I called and got an appointment for the next day.  Was impressed by the fact that I got a call later the same day to let me know that the repairman would be later than planned the next day, so I didn't have to spend all day waiting.  Comcast should take note on customer service!  I was told the repairman would be there between between 12 and 4 and he, Gearado, was there by 2:30-calling even to let me know when he was 20 minutes out.  He quickly diagnosed and fixed the problem, even scoping out some potential issues (a loose chain and bad pulleys) without leaving me to feel like he was padding the visit.  Happy to have someone actually fix something and not just jump to pressing me to replace it.  Especially considering that I've been in my house 14 years and this is the garage door and opener that was there when I bought it. Never thought I would be this excited to use my garage again, but I am.  Thanks Gearado and the Crystal Overhead team.  Well done.

24.description: Be advised, they may not call you back even if you are having an emergency situation. I called them a little after 5PM on Friday, June 13, 2014 and requested immediate help. I called twice more on Friday evening, using both of the numbers they had listed to be sure they got the request. Today, June 16th, I finally got a return call at 3PM, and was treated rudely as I was informed that they were closed since my call and were now responding. When I checked their information and saw they do in fact show their hours as including Saturdays, I called the woman back. She said they have technicians on Saturday but no one checks for messages until Monday. Even with that consideration, 3PM is pretty late in the day to pick up messages. I then told her that they should have that information included on their web site, Yelp page, Angie's List page, and in their phone message, and she said she was just doing her job and that was the end of the call. I WOULD NEVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN, ALTHOUGH IN NOVEMBER OF 2012 THEY WERE GREAT. NO MORE!!!

7.description: I called @ 8 am Saturday morning.  They came out and fixed my garage by noon the same day.    These are nice,honest, and hard working people.  A+

49.description: I live out of state and own a rental house in the northwest suburbs.   One of the torsion springs had broken and I needed a replacement.   I contacted Crystal via email for an estimate.  They promptly replied.   Once I called to schedule, they were quite flexible in available appointment times.   They arrived later than the originally scheduled appointment time but were sure to call me to let me know.  The repair was completed quickly and cost exactly what they estimated.

40.description: Eric could not send a repairman today, but he walked me thru getting the door down and will be back tuesday.

53.description: I could not be more pleased with my experience with Crystal Overhead Doors. Eric arrived on time, worked quickly, yet explained everything that he was doing to our door in a manner in which I understood. I am NOT a chick who knows a thing about repairing anything. Not salesy or pushy. Just a genuinely nice guy. Outstanding work and amazing customer service. FAIR pricing. Had our door back up & running in  45 mins! Couldn't be happier. I would recommend him a thousand times over! Look no further. Call Crystal Overhead Doors NOW! You'll be so glad you did!

30.description: I have had two terrible experiences with Crystal Overhead Door. We ordered a new door from them. They installed the wrong color. First they said that it was the color that I ordered and were adamant about it. After changing their story many times and never apologising, they admitted that they wrote it down incorrectly. Then they tried to convince me to keep the incorrect color, saying that the other one would take a couple of weeks and we would be without one. I argued that I deserved some sort of compensation and they were rude and completely opposed to them taking any accountability. The new door came in (miraculously) within 2 days. Aka they were lying about the wait to try and force the first door on me. The second visit was for a "repair" that was actually the cause of them putting it on the wrong setting at install. They blamed us and said it wasn't under warranty and would need payment for the service. They have terrible customer service skills and are not honest when doing business.

46.description: Super easy to work with! They came out the next day (would have been same day but I was slow to return their call). The tech explained everything to me and was very friendly, professional, and fast. He also called me when he was 30 minutes away and arrived exactly on time and within the window of time they promised to be there. Would definitely recommend and use again!

1.description: Fast service. Professional repairs. Courteous personnel. Reasonable price. Very happy with results. Will refer them to friends.

55.description: I contacted Crystal door to fix my garage door. I have a very large three car door, that borders on commercial and was worried I wouldn't be able to get it fixed, (at least not affordably). After speaking with Ann, she assured me that repairing my door would not be a problem. I scheduled an appointment, and was thrilled when Joel showed up 5 minutes prior. Joel took a quick look at the door and explained what the problem was. He told me how much the repair would be and got to work. Within 30 minutes my behemoth of a garage door was working again. Joel even, took the time to explain the importance of lubricating my springs and other moving parts, to avoid problems in the future. I have not had any problem since, but if I do I will be calling Crystal Overhead Door again. A+

9.description: Another artic day in Chicago - hinge (and the door face) on the garage door popped.  I called Crystal Overhead Door (COD) and arranged to have someone come out following morning.  Tech was on time and did outstanding job. the door needed to be replaced which would take couple days to get in stock - tech did temporary patch (at no charge), presented options for the new door (on the Ipad), I selected the option desired, he ordered the door and scheduled the install (all while onsite).Installation team came out two days later and did a great job (again in frigid temperatures).The entire COD team did a great job! - EXCELLENT service experienceBTW - I do not write many reviews - the service in this case was exceptional and hence the write up

26.description: Fast, reasonable rates, knowledgeable.  Went above and beyond, educating us on the mechanics of our door...definitely reccomend.

25.description: Solid service. Prompt, and fairly priced. I own a few rental properties and am usually in a jam when I call. Crystal always bails me out and makes my tenants happy.

12.description: This team is first class!  They installed our garage door when the house was built 5 years ago.  We've had some trouble with the door touching the ground and bouncing back up again.  Crystal's oustanding service starts with the office staff.  They always answer the call quickly and cheerfully with an orientation to help.  Even after hours, they respond quickly if you ask for emergency service.  The techs are knowledgeable and solutions-oriented, and when our issue became hard to solve, Crystal quickly engaged the top people at the company who came quickly, fixed the problem and did not charge us for a return visit.  I'm convinced they want my door to work perfectly as much as I do!

59.description: Had an issue with the garage door tonight and called Crystal Overhead. Eric stopped by (15 minutes earlier than expected) and quickly pinpointed all of the issues that were going on with the garage including a split wood frame.He was able to replace the components that needed replacing, fixed pieces of the garage that neede fixing, and figure out a way to make a permanent fix for the cracked wood (saving me $$$)...all within a one hour timespan.Very good attitude and upbeat as he did the work. Will use for all of my garage door needs going forth. Highly Recommend.

21.description: Came out promptly multiple times.  First for minor repair when garage wouldn't close consistently and later when the entire door had to be replaced after being hit by a vehicle.  Service was quick, honest, and reliable.  Would use again.

17.description: Eric is the overhead door whisperer. Our commercial overhead door  was always a little off since the day it was installed. Its like it was "reborn" .

10.description: Hi Eric,I couldn't change my previous 1-star to a 5-star so I decided to write another review.I called this morning (~10:36am) in response to your email yesterday. I have to provide the details of this experience because all of this took place in less than 24 hours.(1) The operator picked up on the 1st ring! (To be accurate the 1/2 ring!) I told her who I was and that I was replying to an email from Eric W. She asked me to hold for Eric who picked up in about 90 seconds or less.(2) Our conversation was like this: 'I'm sorry you are unhappy. When can I come out to fix this? I am available anytime today or next week except Monday (holiday)." I agreed that today would be good and Eric's reply was: 'I'm leaving right now. I'll see you in a few minutes.'(3) When Eric arrived he was cordial and personable, the all around 'nice guy'. I could not be happier! I explained the problems I still had outstanding and he says: 'I'll fix those right now!' He went to his truck, got the necessary parts and fixed every single issue! In one hour my garage door was secure and I was once again a happy camper. And he did all of this without a cape! Super Job!!! I cannot thank you enough.Regards,Roscoep.s.Stand by your work more than 5 years later! Who does that?!!!! Great doing business with you.

5.description: From quick estimates to efficient/complete/fast installation, we have been thrilled with Crystal. Would absolutely recommend for garage door service/installation etc.

3.description: I have been working with these guys for over 20 years. They are really dependable and kind. I had Mark over and he was so nice. He inspected everything and greased the tracks without me even asking. He knew the problems right away. I felt that I really should write a review because there are too many fly by night operations in Chicago. When I have something nice to share then I think other people should be able to use it as well. I only wish they rehabbed houses so I wouldn't have to deal without contractors. lol

35.description: Rock solid. They had our door fixed within 48 hours of my calling them. And they were reasonably priced and helpful in suggesting possible upgrades --- but not pushy. We'll definitely call them next time we run into problems.

19.description: I contacted Crystal nearly 2 weeks ago for a quote for a new residential overhead door. The tech came out the same day and gave me a rough quote for $1350.00 for a mid level door.  He wasn't sure about a couple of the parts or available colors so he told me that he or someone else would contact me no later than the following evening.  I never heard back from them. This actually worked out to my benefit because I ended up using another company which just finished installing the same door for $850, and I am very happy with the finished product.

28.description: I received a call from the owner of the company and he apologized for the issues and stated that he would address them with his employees and in their next company meeting. It is good to hear that a company is going to improve the quality and care of service after a complaint. Sometimes it is difficult to address issues unless a complaint is made, and even more difficult when the boss doesn't catch wind of them. In this instance, my call on the day of service didn't get recognized, but my complaint did. And for that, cheers to Yelp! And to Crystal Overhead Door for following up!

45.description: I needed an extra remote and a keypad installed. A technician/repairman came out as scheduled. The service was done correctly and quickly. The estimate was spot on. I couldn't be happier with the work done and the prompt manner in which it was completed.The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the tech chuckled when he realized how old the garage door opener was. He asked why I won't just get a new garage door opener. I told him that it works just fine as far as I could tell, unless he has some more insight, we should probably just keep it. Besides, I am a renter (at this location for just over one year); it was here when I got here and it's not up to me to make those kinds of changes. He shrugged it off at that point. The entire exchange left me feeling like I was wasting his time or I was being cheap.

33.description: The garage door was stuck, called and left a VM message on a Sunday afternoon, got a call back first thing Monday morning and their guy Tom was here before noon. It was a miserably cold day but that didn't slow him down a bit. Explained the problem and my options very clearly. Said he could repair the old unit but I decided it was time to replace it (it had given me trouble before and was over 20 years old). Tom gave me absolutely no hard sell at all. He had it replaced and ready to go within an hour or so. Works beautifully. Tom's a true professional, very personable, really knows his stuff, the price was reasonable, and I couldn't be happier. (Used the Yelp coupon for $25 discount). I recommend Crystal 100%.

43.description: The gate to our associations garage stopped working. Our normal garage serviceman came out and manually opened the door for us so everyone could get in and out of their garages but unfortunately could not fix the problem on the spot. Eric from Crystal Overhead Door Inc. came out and within minutes knew exactly what the problem was and within 15 minutes our gate was working again. I wish he had been our first call!

2.description: Great service.   Arrived same day as call.   Replaced our motor in less than 2 hours and quick to resolve follow-up questions.    This is the second time (moved) I have used Crystal and both and have been positive experiences.   It is nice to find great service and good pricing and appreciate Rick and the guys at Crystal.

18.description: Had an issue with our garage door where our spring snapped due to the cold and had our cars stuck in the garage during the recent cold wave.  Called, left a message and they responded promptly as well as fit us into their schedule that day even though they were obviously slammed with others like us having issues with their garage doors due to the cold.They came out when they said they would and we're very good about calling ahead and providing an ETA, fixed the door quickly - apparently an easy fix since we already had another working spring that they could connect to and for the garage door opened in minutes. Didn't even charge us.Seriously a great company that offers top notch customer service and support along with excellent communication,  I'd recommend them to anyone looking for a assistance with their garage doors.Thanks again, guys -

41.description: Thank you Tom for taking care of the springs and carriage on my garage door today. He was very thorough, walked me through all the work he was doing and got my aging garage back up and running nicely. It was an easy and efficient process to get an appointment and have this headache taken care of just in time for the snow tonight. Thank you again Tom and hopefully I won't be calling again too soon.

52.description: Really liked these guys. The only I didn't give them the 5 stars was a little lack of communication. On 2 different occasions they were supposed to "call when they were on their way" instead they just showed up. Eric really knows his stuff and runs a tight ship. Good products, good service.

50.description: Extremely satisfied with Crystal Overhead door service today.  Tom was professional, knowledgable and efficient, fixed my door within an hour of getting to me- would highly recommend Tom and Crystal Door

4.description: This is as painless as it gets.  I called when my garage door didn't go up all the way and the antenna on a new SUV was hitting the door.  Making the appointment to come over was easy as could be and their technician was professional, knowledgeable and friendly.  He gave me a number of pointers for routine service that I really didn't know about and we even talked about the potential for garage door expansion.This problem I had was solved quickly and painlessly... and to me the pain trade is something that is very important to me.  At the end of the day, if we end up expanding this 1.5 car garage to a 2 car garage, I will not hesitate to use Crystal Overhead Door.Thanks,Brian

6.description: Steve came out. Was knowledgeable and forthright. He had a good understanding of my garage door problem. I am mechanically inclined but was unsure of the proper angle of my garage door opener. He showed me how to do the proper maintenance on my door and gave me all of my options from 15 to 1000 dollars. Will be using again.

22.description: I contacted Crystal nearly 2 weeks ago for a quote for a new residential overhead door. The tech came out the same day and gave me a rough quote for $1350.00 for a mid level door.  He wasn't sure about a couple of the parts or available colors so he told me that he or someone else would contact me no later than the following evening.  I never heard back from them. This actually worked out to my benefit because I ended up using another company which just finished installing the same door for $850, and I am very happy with the finished product.

15.description: I chose this place based on the great reviews, but these guys are a scam.  I'll save you the details, but it has been one thing after the other. Each time they come out, there's another $200 bill to keep my garage door working. Yesterday was the fourth time in two years; the guy tried to sell me a  whole new system for $380 (my system is only two years old), and when I declined, he essentially threatened me and told me that something would go wrong where I would need his help. Then he wouldn't give my remote back and told me I needed to give him $40 for a new one. I had to pretend to buy the new system to get my remote; as soon as he left I called to cancel. Scary. So, beware. They are very nice on the phone, but they are a money pit. I'd take all of those reviews with a big grain of salt.

57.description: So I was at my parents when their garage door broke, and no...I didn't break it.  ;)We (they) called Crystal Overhead Door, spoke with Eric and in no time had a tech out to fix it.  Just like that it was fixed! Very reasonable & super professional. Next time I break my parents garage door, I know who to call.

20.description: Great guys. Fast service. Great pricing.I had new springs ordered and installed in a day after checking on the problem. Will definitely use them again (but hopefully I won't need to).

36.description: I can see why they are so well-rated. Super nice guy who took my call and scheduled the appointment. The repair technician showed up within the promised window and since he was able to fix the problem in less than 5 minutes with a turn of the screwdriver, there was no charge. He talked about other "lift options" that would prevent some of the cold weather problems we were having (without a heavy sell) and was very honest that they could certainly do it anytime or we could wait until the current system failed... but there was no immediate need to do it. Crystal is a throwback to the kind of businesses that you wish were more common today. They are not out to gouge you, or sell you things you don't need... and you feel like you can trust them. They will certainly be our first call for repairs or replacements in the future.

14.description: One of the two springs broke that raise and lower our Blue Max garage door on Christmas Eve day. Commendably, Crystal Overhead Door gave its workers a long holiday weekend until the following Monday morning, but a staffer took my name and address and promised someone would check out the door on the following Monday. Joel showed up Monday morning, and replaced the one broken spring in about 15 minutes. He promised to return to replace other spring within a few days. That replacement took place the next day, and also was accomplished within minutes. Efficient, reliable, polite and as far as I could tell, a thoroughly fair price. Many thanks.

0.description: Jerry has been a barber for over 30 years. The haircuts for men are priced reasonably. Fast in and out usually.

12.description: This place is ALWAYS out of Ketchup in the area where customers get their own napkins and ketchup. I recommend asking for Ketchup at the counter when picking up food. One time I went to this location and ordered in-store a regular double cheeseburger. When I went to eat it-the wrapper had a sticker on it stating "No pickles" and "Drive-thru." I ate the thing, but should not have. Passing off a mistake on me? Wtf?!Another time I ordered in-store and when I was finished ordering the girl at the counter said "that's to go right?" I said yeah even though I wanted to eat in-store. The lazy moron did not even give me the option of  "for here."I will say however that this location is GREAT for Breakfast. They are on the ball in the daytime.I never will go to this location again other than for Breakfast. Bad attitudes and inept condiment stocking abound here at night. You are better off going to the location at Milwaukee and Elston any night of the week.

7.description: Yes it's a McDonald's. Yes, it's a little bit cleaner. But this is a MUST READ.The other night, I got not one, but TWO HAIRS in a big mac. I called in and the manager was nice enough to let me pick up another meal that night.But this morning with my bf, we came for breakfast.  We ordered two meals. I got the bacon,egg, cheese mc griddle value meal. Him the sausage mc muffin. We ordered two orange juices. = $2 a piece for orange juice, right?So when i finished my oj, i asked if they do refills on OJ. They said no. So i went to the fountain bar. Sign reads "limit one refill per customer per visit." So i refilled with some juice.I got immediately yelled at by a  lady behind the counter "You can't refill. That's only for people who bought a soda. You need to pay me a dollar."  I ask why. "So.... i paid $2 for my orange juice. and I can't get a refill. But the person who paid $1 for their soda can???"  She says yes.My bf gives her the dollar to keep me from gettin into cahoots. OH yeah. Dollar plus tax. He tells her the sign is misleading. She says "no, it's obvious the refill is only for people who get soda." Never coming here again.

3.description: This is a decent restaurant and has perfectly prepared food all around. It's recently renovated and the only issue I had was that there was some garbage in the bathroom. There is plenty of parking and the rest of the place is clean.

1.description: I tend to wander around Jefferson Park while I'm waiting for buses and such. Eventually I walked into this place after seeing all the ads for the new bacon club burger. The burger looked good, but just like the "angus" burger I expected disappointment. This Mcdonalds for the most part is kept clean and is not run down. There weren't many people in here since it was the evening (around 6:30-7pm.) I stepped up to the plate, ordered my bacon club burger combo. It was about $7.35 for the combo, a bit steep for Mcdonalds standards so I was expecting something better than average. Boy oh boy was I surprised! Wow I mean whoever prepare this burger must see themselves as a "burger artist" because it looked as if it came straight off the poster. The taste was fantastic as well, is this truly Mcdonalds or was my drink spiked with LSD, making me hallucinate I'm in an alternate reality where Mcdonalds is a 5 star restaurant. I mean there was real applewood bacon on this thing, not the thin bland strips we're accustomed to. The meat was great, bun looked nice, lettuce was fresh. The sauce they put on it really brought out the flavor, what the heck is going on? As I walked out in disbelief I noted that this place warranted a second visit.Upon my second visit I decided to order different things on the surprisingly off the wall menu here. I haven't been to Mcdonalds in a while so maybe they made some changes, but I ordered the buffalo ranch McChicken and bbq bacon Mcdouble. Immediately upon walking into the restaurant I spotted what looked like blood on the flood at the registers. Was there a fist fight earlier? Or did one of the "classy" Mcdonalds customers just spit on the floor while they were waiting for their order? Honestly it could be either one. Got my order in under 3 minutes again and ate them while I waited at the train station. Ah, the usual crappy taste of the McChicken/Chicken Sponge only this time paired with cheap ranch and buffalo sauce. One would think with them upping their game with that club sandwich they'd actually soak the chicken in buffalo sauce or at least toss it with the sauce not just throw a few squirts on after it's been cooked. The bacon Mcdouble had those crappy thin strips and I don't know what was going on with the meat, but it was like eating a rice cake or something. Something tells me the meat on the Mcdouble was near its expiration date.Overall this place is better than most Mcdonalds. They get your order out fast, don't have long lines, and from what I've seen they have decent people for customers (aside from the mysterious blood on the floor). The new bacon club burger seems to up the standards of the menu, but the rest of the items are still the same crap Mcdonalds has been serving for years with added spins on a few items here and there.

2.description: This McDonald's is a TERRIBLE place to enjoy any meal from the menu !!!!What makes it AWFUL is the Customer service!!The security from McDonald is SO AGGRESSIVE ! The security guard threat a 17 year old. The security guard told the 17 year old, "I will choke your ass."Don't love the service anymore at jefferson park McDonald's Not even one star !!!

9.description: As like others.....this one suits is purpose....got dinner once here (which they did screw up, but in the morning I get what I want.  Friendly staff, for what it is ...its clean; they got alot of people from JP and there must be a school close by or kids using this as a pit stop.

10.description: Prepare to be nickle and dimed!  We went here and were not impressed.  Sure the restaurant's modern and clean, from what I saw, but there were some lackings.  We don't go to McD's often (once every 4-6 months maybe) and we tried a new location passing by.  Not only is the dollar menu not a dollar, cheeseburger was $1.20 plus they allegedly charge for a wilted piece of lettuce ($0.20).  Then I sat down to eat my food (was starving!) and I open up my southern chicken sandwich and there's no lettuce or tomato (I didn't ask for it, but I didn't know you had to).  I'm surprised they didn't charge for the pickles!  I asked for mayo on the side it was nowhere to be found.  I went back and they fixed it but the manager charged me $0.39 for the tomato slice.  I can buy a whole friggen' tomato for that much at a produce store!  Then there's no napkins anywhere, you had to ask for them behind the counter! Can we include 1 napkin at least per order or should I use my shirt?  Then I go to get ketchup and there's no cups for it, I had to use a pop lid, which was messy.  Does that mean they charge for ketchup or were they lazy??  Get it in gear, Jefferson Park McDonald's.  If I could go back in time I would have gone to the Subway a block away, and it would have been cheaper and less of a hassle!

13.description: They don't have outlets to plug in your laptop.

16.description: Ok, so I'm a dork for reviewing a McDonald's, but I gotta give a shout-out.  We rarely eat in (newly built), almost always drive thru, maybe every 10-14 days or so.  Everyone's always nice, friendly.  I pretty much resist going to McD's anytime, but when I do give in to my kiddos, I'm glad to at least have a decent one to drive thru on the way home.

17.description: I agree Danny but i just came from there and they had the A/C on instead of the Heat on  i froze my butt off

15.description: Charged me 27 cents for bbq sauce. Receipt was generic said ketchup and bbq. Receipt should be specific or its price fixing and illegal. If we agree to pay for bbq sauce next you know we'll be paying for ketchup and napkins. One star till receipt gets fixed. Stopped by there again tonight (1-5-2011) with a ton of people behind the counter, hardly any customers in line at the register and with millions of dollars in annual sales, there was no reason for the garbage cans to be over flowing other than poor management.

0.description: The Service was ok and quick... I did like that we were able to get the Burger Build Off finalist- Rio Crisp Burger and ChiTown Classic which were both pretty good. I like McDo locations that allow free refills with soda dispensers not behind the counters

5.description: If I could give this place zero stars, I would.They pay a guy to sit in the parking lot and watch people coming in and and out of the parking lot.  If you leave the parking lot, they will boot your car and charge you $140 to remove it.  Earlier today, stopped at this McDonalds for a cup of coffee.  I parked in the lot, walked across the street, bought a newspaper, and returned to McDonalds for the coffee.  When I came out of McDonalds, there was a boot on the car.The guy who booted my car explained that he witnessed me leave the lot and therefore violated their parking rules.  I tried explaining to him that I left the lot to buy a paper, was gone for a whole minute, and then returned to McDonalds to read the paper and have a cup of coffee.  His response?  Well, you just admitted to your wrong doing.I will never stop at this McDonalds again. It's possible that I will never stop at any McDonalds again.

11.description: This place has good food . But they will always mess up ur coffee pour it from different pitchers and it tastes horrible . I haven't been to a MCDonalds that actually had good tasting coffee and won't make u go to the toilet . Btw If u ask for a fresh cup of coffee they will get rude and won't wanna do it

8.description: OK fine, this is probably my Yelp jump the shark moment, but whatever. I'm not reviewing McDonald's exactly, because everyone has had McDonald's and you don't need me to tell you what a Big Mac is. You have to grade these sorts of places on their own curve, which is: as far as McDonald's franchises [or whatever chains] go, is this location better or worse than the norm?I stop here quite often for coffee in the mornings and will get a quick snack on my way home from work on occasion, especially when I'm trying to gain weight (don't ask). Here's what I can say:1.) I've never waited more than three minutes for an order, from line to bag in hand, regardless of how busy it is.2.) They've never messed up an order on me.3.) The food has never been cold.It's really pretty simple, and they do what McDonald's is supposed to do, so there. Kudos, Jefferson Park McDonald's. Chain restaurants all tend to have really awful reviews on Yelp because no one is reviewing them unless something bad happens. Count this as one tiny blow for justice.(Why only four stars then? Unfortunately, lots of homeless do tend to congregate here during the day because of the proximity to the bus depot. Many are harmless but a few are rowdy. There's nothing the franchisees can really do about it but it is a drawback.)

4.description: Never thought I would be writing a review for a McDonald's but this isn't about their food.  To me, their food tastes the same no matter which location you visit - pretty much across the country you get what you expect.  The thing that makes this one different is that if you are a frequent drive-thru customer during the day then you have the pleasure to meet Michael at the first window and Elena at the second one.  They are the friendliest, happiest, sweetest fast food workers I have ever met.  When I get to the speaker and place the same order I always do - a large diet coke in a foam cup - I am met with "I got you Amy" and then smiles, how are you's, and genuinely kind and funny repertoire.  I leave that drive-thru smiling every time the two of them are there!

14.description: It's the same ol Mcdonalds like the rest but it's the best McDonalds as far as the service goes. It's the only one i've been to that doesen't screw up your order and the staff is good too.

6.description: My experience today was just horrible with the morning people. Their drive thru worker is so rude. He first didn't get my order right on the speaker then I went by the window and told him he got my order wrong and he was giving me attitude that he got it. Once I got my order it was all wrong so I went inside the store and told them and the lady at the cashier was even more rude saying it was my fault that I didn't say what I wanted when I clearly said it 3 times. They should really fix there customer service because a lot of people go there since it's by the train station and they're just so rude. Never again.

58.description: Excellent service, delicious pho, and complimentary tea to top it off. Such a Jefferson Park gem!

29.description: The owners don't speak English.  The waiter's don't speak Vietnamese.  The waiter suggested "lemongrass chicken".  I told the waiter MILD.  I took it home.  It's hotter than hell, we can't eat it.   Forget this place, I'm never going back.

42.description: The best pho in town. I've been to many Vietnamese  restaurants but this one is far better than the others.

23.description: I've been coming here almost twice a week for the past month an a half. Can you tell I love this place? For appetizers I get spring rolls. And I always get pho! I recommend #22 and #25. #22 is the combo pho which as everything in it. The servers are friendly and always get my food in ten mins. Good customer service + tasty food for a reasonable price = 5 stars!

47.description: I just had take out this very evening from this family run place. Spring rolls and the typical vermicelli salad with grilled beef. The food was good, not great. The beef was a bit overcooked and the spring rolls, while HUGE, had more lettuce than needed. What got my attention was the amazing friendliness and willingness to accommodate. I will return there often whenever I am in town. Try this place! I bet the Pho is amazing because their wait staff was!

8.description: I had been dying to try it and when I did I was not disappointed. Fantastic soup at reasonable prices. I will be back. And soon!

31.description: It's time I review because I am officially a regular now. Unfortunately I haven't tried much yet because I love the pho (I get the ribeye) and pork egg rolls but some day I want to try the banh mi. Having said that, it's not my favorite pho restaurant in Chicago but it over-exceeds my expectations of what I thought I would find and I am very happy here. The broth is delicious and they put a ton of noodles in. And I am very surprised by people that complain about the service. I think they're very, very nice.  Don't let the fact that it's justion Jefferson Park scare you. It's a very nice restaurant and the soup is very good.Update: still love it here but thing that worried me now makes me feel better. I don't drink water at restaurants so I didn't mention this before but it bothered me that the "water" they bring to the table had a yellowish/brownish color to it. Well I found out today it's TEA!! Duh to me.

34.description: They truly are the number pho in the hood! Great authentic Thai food.  We ordered beef/tripe pho, soft noodle stir fry with seafoods and mango bubble tea - everything was great! Finally an awesome pho in Jefferson park area

16.description: Pho soup to get in our neighborhood was not easy an easy task. However, to have great tasting soup with affordable menu is above the convenience. This place has unique broth of the pho, generous portions, and friendly staff. I patronize this place as often as I could. My favorite soup is meatballs and beef slices. I am salivating of just thinking about it. I am very glad to have this Vietnamese place near home!

13.description: Great little Vietnamese place in Jeff Park. Small, unassuming, and quite good. Try the beef spring rolls with sweet peanut sauce. Then the pork bahn-mi sandwich which was hardy, full of flavor but maybe a little too dry. Then the chicken pho soup. Like most soups you have to dress it up to our liking (like lime, herbs, and saracha) but the base was excellent. Perfect for a 0 degree day. Best part...really inexpensive.  About $17 for 2 of us. Will come back.

11.description: 8 months later and my husband talked me into giving it another go. The service was MUCH better. Above and beyond better. Luis was very sweet and attentive. The owner came out to talk to us and was also very nice. Another plus, they now have a broader choice of condiments. But... the pho just isn't 4 or 5 stars. I don't know if the bowls are too small or if they put too many noodles in but the ratio just seems off to me. Not enough broth. Plus it just wasn't as hot as it is when served at other places. They're suuuuper skimpy on the sprouts and basil too. A better experience all in all and since we live so close, I'll go back. But if I really want a satisfying pho, I'll still head to Argyle.

39.description: Amazing food. Good pho base. Great vermicelli noodles. Spring rolls could use less lettuce. Opened early so have a banh mi for breakfast! Restaurant recently hired a new hostess. Very rude. Get pick up.

37.description: The best place I've been to for vegetarian pho.  They give you two choices for broth (beef or vegerarian) - both are great.  The soup is piled high with bok choy, brocoli, napa, carrots, baby corn, and mushrooms.  The complimentary iced jasmine tea is such a nice touch in summer.  I give them 4 stars and not 5 because the spring rolls are made with ice berg lettuce.  Ice berg lettuce is not nutritious.  Romaine lettuce is standard in spring rolls in this and a minor increase in cost for a huge boost in quality.  Will definitely come back.  This place is worth the additional 10 minute drive compared to the place I used to frequent around the Schaumburg area.

0.description: I cannot stop thinking about the chicken curry soup. Amazing. My coworker has been telling me about this place for a little while now, and she finally took me for lunch this week. My experience was so fantastic - friendly staff, incredibly flavorful food, excellent pricing - that I feel a little sad to have discovered this treasure after years of working close by. I will make up the time, and try to go at least once per week!

38.description: Wow!! What a find in our neighborhood!! Great food, great service!! Some of the best Pho I've ever had!! Highly recommended!!!

51.description: This hole in the wall did not disappoint!  #66 Shrimp was delish!!  I'd love to go back the next time I'm in Chi-town!!

27.description: Saw the great reviews. Here I am. Got the pho 1 combination and shrimp spring rolls. My wife got the veggie pho. The spring rolls were big, fresh and delicious. Could have had less lettuce but the favors were there. The combo pho was delicious, generous, and packed with flavor. A little sweeter than what I'm accustomed to but tasty nonetheless. My wife's pho was good and brimming with fresh veggies. She opted for the beef stock but veggie soup base is available too. I'm coming back.

32.description: If I could give this place a no stars I definitely would. I WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND THIS PLACE TO ANYONE!!! I came here with family for dinner and they were so disrespectful and RACIST. Very unprofessional. The waiter was very rude. The food was very sloppy and bland. When we were paying my father asked to use their bathroom and they laughed at him and said it was washroom to learn how to say it right. I am completely appalled how they treated their customers.

54.description: my hubby heard from a buddy of his to try this vietnamese place that is new to the neighborhood so he took me here for lunch.  it's a cute small and clean place with about eight four-tops, mildly decorated w/vietnamese chotskes, cute. we were given some fresh iced jasmine tea, refreshing.  a nice gentleman took our orders.  the pho chris ordered was extremely heartwarming and i loved all the flavors. my bunh, omg was it fresh, awesome, crazy delicious.  we had the fresh spring rolls too.  this is my new favorite place and i can't wait to return several times.

48.description: I was searching through yelp for some new places nearby and found this.  Me and wife were eager to try it out.  The place is ok, clean and typical Vietnamese feel.  Which made me more excited to taste their food.  Lots of selection on their menu.  Order my favorite noodle soup Bon Bu Hue and wife got her dried vermiceli and our appetizer fresh spring roll.  Appearance of the food looks good and the only draw back is the taste is not up to par but not bad.  Just lucking a little more flavor.  King Pho on Devon and Caldwell is still better but I will still give this place a second try.

44.description: Interesting that they serve Jasmine tea iced water as usual even though I didn't ask. I didn't want any caffeine so ordered regular water. Pho was good but didn't like the pork steak much.

24.description: Great stuff here.  I ordered the pho due to lack of vietnamese options in my own neighborhood.  After seeing other yelp reviews for this little establishment and out of due hunger, I ended up here one night.  The service is fast and friendly and the pho is exactly what I would have imagined pho to be. That is a brothy, noodle deliciousness of a meal.  It's a lot of food, so either bring an appetite or you will have plenty to eat again for 4th meal.  Cold night or a summer day in the city, you can never go wrong with pho.

7.description: I just had dinner here with a group of friends and we all loved it! The food was delicious and fresh tasting and the service was fast and friendly! I'll definitely be back!

49.description: Ah-mazzzing food and bubble teas! They use real fruit on the smoothies. Really great broth (perfect sweet n' salty, just right!!) and tender meats and noodles. Absolutely perfect dining experience :D.

40.description: Always driven by here and finally tried their food!  Like their food definitely will return!

53.description: What a wonderful surprise this place was! Refreshing jasmine tea the second you sit down, super-friendly wait staff, EXCELLENT egg rolls, fast and hot food that's delish, and great prices. I had the shrimp stir fry with soft noodles. Yummy! Next time, though, I will definitely try the Pho. My only complaint is that they don't deliver. :( The portions are HUGE so get ready for some leftovers!

30.description: Came with a friend on a Saturday late afternoon and the place was empty except one other table. I ordered stir fry vegetables and it was phenomenal!!! Can't wait to return to Chicago to eat here again. Lovely wait staff as well!

46.description: This place is located in a tiny strip mall on Lawrence and is very easy to miss. I can't believe how many times I passed by and didn't know this place existed! Well I'm happy to have ventured in here today.My mom and I came in for lunch and the place was pretty empty. We were promptly greeted by the waitress and she also served us with delicious jasmine iced tea. They had a decent sized menu but we were In the mood for pho. I went with shrimp and my mom went with the chicken. I really enjoyed the shrimp pho but my only complaint wold be that there just wasn't enough shrimp. No complaints from my moms end, she loved her pho. I will definitely come back but I will be sure to try something else next time

1.description: Nice place serving good flavourful food. The options are extensive. The servers are courteous and helpful. As the place is smaller they find it difficult and take time to cater to bigger groups. I tried the shrimp and chicken, which was well cooked. The cook screwed on the amount of salt but it was corrected when we spoke to the server.All in all, will not be a regular to this place.

55.description: Seated right away with friendly and prompt service. Restaurant was very clean. Vietnamese Eggs rolls with shrimp were an excellent starter. Our meal was was fresh and very tasty without being salty or greasy. Will definitely be back to try more on the menu. You can't go wrong with an all around good meal here!

9.description: Friendly staff. The rib eye pho was incredible. Cant wait to try the banh mi sandwich.

26.description: I wished they had a 3.5 star. We definitely go here and eat often. Just because of its location in the northwest side. The food is moderate but doesn't taste authentic. The price is okay. Food portion is average.

25.description: 3rd time here... New to the neighborhood and happy to have found it. Endless options, Boba smoothies, Jasmine iced tea... always a friendly face / smile / welcome

12.description: Simply amazing! I can't stop coming here!

59.description: Amazing! I walked in here on a Sunday evening and got greated with an iced Jasmine tea and great service.The food was phenomenal.  I had the seafood pho and hubby had the steak - Both delicious.

21.description: Amazing food and quick service!! Love their pho: seafood, beef and the filet mignon! The broth is super flavorful and won over some tough critics in my family. Big spring rolls, tasty!

17.description: One of my favorite restaurants in Chicago, the food is so healthy and good! They also have Vietnamese coconuts which I buy every time I go there.

10.description: Amazing food and quick service!! Love their pho: seafood, beef and the filet mignon! The broth is super flavorful and won over some tough critics in my family. Big spring rolls, tasty!

5.description: Been wanting to try this place. My in laws live close so it's nice to know we can get some Vietnamese food close by. Place is small and not hard to find. We ordered a Vietnamese steamed rice roll for an appetizer and a beef pho and veggie pho. The rice roll was the first time my wife had tried it and she really liked it. I thought it was well made, maybe just a little more of the sauce would have been great. I'm sure they would have gave it to me if I asked. My wife had the veggie pho and she liked it a lot. I had the beef pho and the broth was really good. They gave a lot of beef so it wasn't like some of those cheap places with 2-3 pieces in it. Overall I thought the food was really good. It has no other cuisine close by so it makes it a great little gem. I usually goto argyle for pho and this place can definitely replace going there if I lived closer to it. I also had a mango smoothie and it was really good as well. I love my drinks cold as it was made with ice so it was like a freeze. This place also gave us jasmine ice tea and not just water. Nice touch...

3.description: Saw the great reviews. Here I am. Got the pho 1 combination and shrimp spring rolls. My wife got the veggie pho. The spring rolls were big, fresh and delicious. Could have had less lettuce but the favors were there. The combo pho was delicious, generous, and packed with flavor. A little sweeter than what I'm accustomed to but tasty nonetheless. My wife's pho was good and brimming with fresh veggies. She opted for the beef stock but veggie soup base is available too. I'm coming back.

35.description: My wife teaches school in the area and after reading some of the reviews about this establishment,  we had to try it.  We decided to meet here after classes and the parking lot at the front of the restaurant had plenty of spaces.  We had the Spring Rolls and Crab Rangoon for appetizers.  The starters were good, the sauce for the Crab Rangoon was a bit spicy.For the main course, my wife had the Combination Fried Rice with shrimp and BBQ pork and I ordered the Chicken Pho.  The dishes were decent with the Pho being the better tasting of the two.  The broth was "heavy" with a cinnamon taste, lots of chicken and noodles.  We will return to try out some different dishes soon.

19.description: Great stuff here.  I ordered the pho due to lack of vietnamese options in my own neighborhood.  After seeing other yelp reviews for this little establishment and out of due hunger, I ended up here one night.  The service is fast and friendly and the pho is exactly what I would have imagined pho to be. That is a brothy, noodle deliciousness of a meal.  It's a lot of food, so either bring an appetite or you will have plenty to eat again for 4th meal.  Cold night or a summer day in the city, you can never go wrong with pho.

28.description: So good! First time I had pho, and I will definitely be back! The food is great, service is awesome, and I will definitely be coming back soon and telling people about it!

45.description: Free iced jasmine tea. Super-delicious soup and Bun. Tasty egg rolls. Fast service. Wish I'd tried this place earlier!

33.description: I've been multiple times. The Pho is always great. The spicy soup #42 is also excellent.

43.description: Good place, service was great, food was good, prices good.it was clean and never an Empty seats.

2.description: My boyfriend and I decided to give this place a shot instead of going to our usual pho spot and we did not like the pho here. The broth had too much black pepper but the noodle was good. I personally think if they lessen the black pepper it would of been better. If you ask for extra noodle on the side, beware.. It's literally a bowl of noodle (same amount of your actually pho bowl) They do serve jasmine ice tea which I really enjoyed. I don't think we will be coming back to this place again.

18.description: I love this place. I waited so long for them to open and was thrilled that the food was so good. Use to live in Albany Park area and would go to places in the Broadway and Argyle area. Moving to Elmwood Park  made for a tedious drive so far east.  They have added to their menu since opening and everything i have tried hanise1950s been great. But you can't beat the pho!

41.description: Delicious pho and just right in the neighborhood. Will love to come back over and over! Highly recommend it!

52.description: Just phenomenal. The flavor and colors absolutely pop. Far and away the best I've had in the city away from Argyle street but I would it against Pho 888 anytime. Very traditional right down to the greens served. Try the pho #29, the broth rocks. Don't miss the beef stew, located under the sandwiches section, best version of this I've had anywhere so far.

50.description: OMG  Great  Great GreatWhat more can be said?  The Pho is wonderful and the spring rolls are huge.  I've had the chicken, and beef pho and both are so tasty.  Great place. I normally do take out but I cannot wait to dine in.  Pleasant atmosphere.  Love it

4.description: Place seems understaffed. My sandwich was plain, the tofu was just lightly seasoned. The other sandwich turned out to be soup with bread on the side, which took a long time to prep. They didn't give us one of our drinks and completely ignored us. I was exited to find a Vietnamese place in this neighborhood, my mistake. The jasmine water was good. Won't be back, sorry.

6.description: Delicious!I can't wait to go back.  We went on a Friday and got the last open table.  Service was quick and super friendly.  The food came fast and was piping hot, very fresh, and very flavorful.  We ordered tofu spring rolls, lemongrass tofu and lemongrass chicken and another veggie dish.  The waitress was very friendly and very patient with us even though we were rushing to make it to a concert.  It was all so good, I wish we had had the time to hang out and savor it, but I will definitely go back - this place is a hidden gem - so many other yummy looking things on their menu to try too.  Also, don't be scared, the water looks yellow, but it's flavored with a little jasmine!

22.description: Best chicken pho I've found in the city yet!! Definitely need to come back to try everything else.

15.description: My first time here based on the reviews here on Yelp. I wish I would have known about this neighborhood gem sooner.  I will be back soon.

57.description: This place is great for their generous portions, affordable prices, and attentive and friendly service. I ordered one of the salads with grilled pork and rice noodles, which was fresh and flavorful. I've ordered it at other places which involved dry, cold noodles. The refreshing, iced Jasmine tea was a nice, unique touch too!

20.description: Pho was not on point. Service was slow. And water turned yellow as ice melted. Ewww. Will not be returning.

36.description: Everything was delicious. Service was great.. Theres something really comforting about eating at a table next to one of the owners cutting up fresh basil :)

14.description: Found this place on yelp and I gotta say I love everything about it! It's right down the street from my house. I got the pho with beef and it was very satisfying. I think it could have used more meat but over all so much food! The service was very quick and friendly. Definitely going to be coming here to try other new things on the menu.

28.description: I like this place. Very comfortable to dine in, owner is friendly, and food is great! The best part is their egg rolls and pot stickers. They're fresh, and not frozen!

1.description: Wish I could give this shit hole 0 stars. Very rude. The place is dirty and they have no one who can speak English to get your order right. When I got there after the 20 min wait they told me the cook wasn't even there and they hadn't started making my food yet.

39.description: This place is great, i order food for delivery almost every sunday when im at home. Great sweet and sour chicken and pork. Fast delivery, although I think Kow Kow in Lincolnwood has them beat on THEE best eggrolls.

9.description: Friendly, clean and big menu.Food was okay.Was still eating soup and appetizers when entrees came out.The "serving plates" were cute.Somewhat large for the table size."Just made it home"  if you know what I mean...Gave 3 stars.Everyone else seemed to like it.Don't think I will return.

29.description: This is the Chinese place down the street from my husband's childhood home and the one they ordered from growing up. The nostalgia factor is high here. Stepping into the Golden Wok is like stepping into a time machine. This place reminds me of the Chinese restaurant in A Christmas Story in a lot of different ways. Kitsch factor is high.My husband loves their Hong Sue Chicken. (only available in a large size). I've had several dishes and been underwhelmed by most of them. Too sweet sweet & sour last time. I asked for them to add broccoli and pea pods and they said "that's not how it comes" to which I replied "yes I know but its how I'm asking for it".  I ended up with just 2 broccoli crowns and pea pods but they of course charged me $1.50 for "extra veggies".
